name: Avenging Angel
description: Avenging Angel is a story-driven FPS/Adventure game set in a Steampunk world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Quad Core or AMD FX-8320 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 470 series with 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon RX480 series with 4 GB VRAM or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space
